lines.text: create new long longs n , l and r
loop , decrementing n , while it is not 0
read l and r from the user input
for i = 1 to while ( l | i ) < = r , i < < = 1 ) l | = i
lines.code: for ( register long long i = 1 ; ( l | i ) <= r ; i <<= 1 ) l |= i ;

lines.text: print l to the standard output

mod_code: for ( int i = 1 ; i <= r ; i ++ ) { l |= l ( l | i ) ; }
